install.description: Component includer - include any component in the content (via iframe). A kind of local wrapper. Code is {component}url{/component} . Replace url with the url to your component, WITHOUT index.php?. So the code would look like this: {component}option=com_blabla&Itemid=73&album=7{/component}

param.name: height_auto
param.label: Auto Height
param.description: The height will automatically be set to the size of the external page. This will only work for pages on your own domain. If you see a javascript error, make sure this param is disabled. This will break XHTML compatibility for this page.
